tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP I)) (VP (VBP have) (VP (VBN spent) (NP-TMP (DT the) (NN afternoon)) (PP (IN at) (NP (NP (NNP Santa) (POS 's)) (NNP Grotto))))) (. .)))

tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP It)) (VP (VBD was) (NP (DT an) (JJ absolute) (NN joy) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB be) (NP (NP (DT a) (JJ tiny) (NN part)) (PP (IN of) (S (VP (VBG making) (NP (NP (NNP Christmas)) (PP (IN for) (NP (JJ wee) (NNS ones))))))))))))) (. .)))
